version_description:
We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- Bug Fixes

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- إصلاحات

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- Bug Fixes

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- إصلاحات

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- View analytics and metrics of your listing
- Improved My Listings screen
- Resolved bugs in chat
- Job Seekers can now upload their C.V.
- Verify your account by sending us an SMS
- Specify a category in your Wanted Items
- Spotlight Search
- Better help screens for Addons while uploading your listing
- Better Accessibility for the blind
- Contact an agent in the event of an error
- Other Bug Fixes

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
-مشاهدة احصائيات وتحليلات لاعلانك
- تطوير شاشة " قائمتي "
- اصلاح الأخطاء في المحادثة
- الباحثين عن وظائف بامكانهم الآن نشر " السيرة الذاتية "
- تفعيل حسابك وذلك بإرسالك رسالة نصية
- تحديد قسم معين في " اعلانات مطلوبة "
- بحث spotlight تستطيع الوصول للاقام والمندوبين بالبحث العام من التليفون مباشرة
- تحسين الشاشات المساعدة لإضافة مميزات خلال نشر الاعلان
- تحسين ميزة مساعدة كفيفي البصر
- امكانية الإتصال بمندوب في حالة حدوث خطآ في البرنامج
- إصلاحات اخري

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- إصلاحات اخري

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- All New Service Provider feature. Become a verified service provider and expand your customer base instantly.
- Brand new user-friendly design
- New screen for transactions history
- Category Search from the home screen
- Auto repost your recurring listings
- Wanted items and advanced search enhancements
- Allow searching for "Listings Near Me"
- Set your "Do Not Disturb" hours
- Request a banner or offer directly from the app
- Set an avatar as your profile picture
- Creating a listing before you register

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- جميع مميزات خدمات الحرفيين . بإمكانك تقديم خدماتك كحرفي معتمد وتوسيع قاعدة زبائنك
- تصميم جديد متميز
- البحث عن القسم في الصفحة الرئيسية
- إعادة النشر التلقائي للاعلان
- بحث متقدم بقائمة " الإعلانات المطلوبة "
- البحث بالاعلانات " القريبة مني " حسب المكان
- خاصية عدم الازعاج للاعلانات
- طلب عروض إعلانات تجارية للبانرات مباشرة من التطبيق
- إمكانية وضع صورة خيالية لملفك الشخصي
- إمكانية كتابة الإعلان قبل التسجيل بالبرنامج

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- All New Service Provider feature. Become a verified service provider and expand your customer base instantly.
- Brand new user-friendly design
- New screen for transactions history
- Category Search from the home screen
- Auto repost your recurring listings
- Wanted items and advanced search enhancements
- Allow searching for "Listings Near Me"
- Set your "Do Not Disturb" hours
- Request a banner or offer directly from the app
- Set an avatar as your profile picture
- Creating a listing before you register

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- We've made the app smoother and faster
- Pin and promote your listings in more locations
- Check and order your uploaded images and videos before you submit your listing
- Updated offers section
- See your follow list by order of most recently active
- Other bug fixes

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع فورسيل افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- تم جعل البرنامج اسهل واسرع
- تثبيت وتمييز الاعلان في اكثر من مكان
- التحقق من الصور المرفوعة والفيديو وترتيبها قبل رفع الاعلان
- تحديث جديد لقسم العروض
- بإمكانك مشاهدة قائمة متابعينك بترتيب الاكثر فعالية
- إصلاح مجموعة من الاخطاء

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- We've made the app smoother and faster
- Pin and promote your listings in more locations
- Check and order your uploaded images and videos before you submit your listing
- Updated offers section
- See your follow list by order of most recently active
- Other bug fixes

نهتم بتحديث التطبيق دائما لحل المشاكل وإضافة مميزات جديدة كل هذا لجعل تجربتك مع 4Sale افضل.‎

مالجديد ؟
- تم جعل البرنامج اسهل واسرع
- تثبيت وتمييز الاعلان في اكثر من مكان
- التحقق من الصور المرفوعة والفيديو وترتيبها قبل رفع الاعلان
- تحديث جديد لقسم العروض
- بإمكانك مشاهدة قائمة متابعينك بترتيب الاكثر فعالية
- إصلاح مجموعة من الاخطاء

We are constantly making updates to resolve issues, add features, and ultimately make your 4Sale experience better. Stay up to date and get the latest release!

What's New:
- Auto-translate advertisements
- Select between English & Arabic to view advertisements
- Redesign "Feature your Advertisement" screen
- Other bug fixes

You spoke, and we listened!
We’re pleased to announce improvements to your 4Sale listing experience. This update brings huge changes in the way you upload your listing - now you’ll only enter data that are relevant to the category you’re selling in. These changes are part of our continuous efforts to improve selling & buying on 4Sale.
Remember! The more accurate information you provide, the more potential buyers will see it!

4 Sale. 4 Buying. 4 Selling. 4 Life.

You spoke, and we listened!
We’re pleased to announce improvements to your 4Sale listing experience. This update brings huge changes in the way you upload your listing - now you’ll only enter data that are relevant to the category you’re selling in. These changes are part of our continuous efforts to improve selling & buying on 4Sale.
Remember! The more accurate information you provide, the more potential buyers will see it!

4 Sale. 4 Buying. 4 Selling. 4 Life.

New in this update:
The 4Sale app now automatically opens in the language you selected when creating your profile. If no selection was made, the 4Sale app will automatically open in your device language.

We’re constantly working behind the scenes to improve your 4Sale experience.
New in this update:
1. Recommended for You. This is a new way for you to find relevant listings based on your searches.
2. The 4Sale app now automatically opens in the language you selected when creating your profile. If no selection was made, the 4Sale app will automatically open in your device language.
3. Bug fixes and app enhancements.

We’re constantly working to improve your 4Sale experience. In this update we bring you a new and improved Property experience if you’re looking to rent or buy:
New look and feel for property listing pages
Important actions (like calling the lister or adding the listing to favorites) are easier to do

We’re constantly working to improve your 4Sale experience. In this update we bring you a new and improved Property experience if you’re looking to rent or buy:
New look and feel for property listing pages
Important actions (like calling the lister or adding the listing to favorites) are easier to do

We're constantly working to improve your 4Sale experience. In this update, we bring you a new and improved experience if you're looking to rent, buy, or just adding to your wishlist for now:
- New look and feel for listing pages
- Important actions (like calling the lister or adding the listing to favorites) are easier to do

In this update is our engaging NEW feature Power Pins. Power Pins allows you to post videos or photos in a range of exciting new locations. Upload from the Power Pin button or select Power Pins as an add-on when you post your listing. Power Pins help you:
• Be seen by users in prime locations on the app
• Get phone calls or messages right from your Power Pin

Every update brings new features and improvements to your 4Sale experience. In this update:

- We’ve organized our home screen to make it easier to navigate to key categories.
- You can now update your listing, boost it, or change settings right from the seller dashboard.
- Due to popular demand, we’ve created more positions for Power Pins - now available on category pages! You can also click through to the listing directly from the Power Pin.

- Registering is easier than ever: now you can receive your OTP by WhatsApp. If you don’t use WhatsApp, you can still receive your OTP via SMS or Voice Call.
- Introducing the Power Pins tutorial - learn more about this engaging new feature!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Continuous improvements for a better experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Every update brings new features and improvements to your 4Sale experience.
In this update:

· We’ve introduced an Auto-recommend feature that will help you sell your listings by suggesting relevant addons to boost your sales.
· You will be able to indicate whether your listings are sold on 4Sale or on a different platform, in order to help us collect data to improve your experience.
· Your sold listings will be archived to help maintain a seamless experience for our buyers.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This update brings continuous improvements for enhanced usability. 
Sellers can now add more information to enhance location accuracy. 
Remember! The more accurate information you provide, the more potential buyers will see it!
Buyers can now search with location keywords across all categories for a better experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This release brings huge changes to 4Sale’s viewing experience. We’ve worked hard to streamline and optimize the experience end-to-end so that you, our valuable users, can find what you’re looking for faster and easier. Here are the highlights of our changes:
• Each category has a unique listings screen experience, showcasing the most important information for you.
• There are key changes in some of our biggest categories:
◦ Property
For the first time on 4Sale, you can search for a property by block. Listings now have bigger images and more precise information.
◦ Automotive
Now you can search across multiple car brands at the same time.
◦ Jobs
We’ve enhanced the experience to find the job you want quicker and easier.
